id.description:
The ID of the plugin instance. The ID cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

name.description:
The plugin instance name. The name cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

pluginDescriptorRef.description:
Reference to the plugin descriptor for this instance. The plugin descriptor cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

parentRef.description:
The reference to this plugin's parent instance. The parent reference is only accepted if the plugin type supports parent instances.
Note: This parent reference is required if this plugin instance is used as an overriding plugin (e.g. connection adapter overrides)

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

encrypted.description: Determines whether the field value should be masked in the UI and encrypted on disk.

size.description: The size of the text field.

columns.description: Get the columns in the table.

requireDefaultRow.description: Configure whether this table requires default row to be set.

label.description: Label for the table to be displayed in the administrative console.

OptionValue.description: An option name and value associated with a selection field.

value.description: The value associated with this option.

CheckBoxFieldDescriptor.description: A boolean field typically rendered as a checkbox in a configuration UI.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

name.description: The name of the configuration field.

value.description: The value for the configuration field. For encrypted or hashed fields, GETs will not return this attribute. To update an encrypted or hashed field, specify the new value in this attribute.

encryptedValue.description: For encrypted or hashed fields, this attribute contains the encrypted representation of the field's value, if a value is defined. If you do not want to update the stored value, this attribute should be passed back unchanged.

inherited.description: Whether this field is inherited from its parent instance. If true, the value/encrypted value properties become read-only. The default value is false.

HashedTextFieldDescriptor.description: A text field that will contain a secure salted hash.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

size.description: The size of the text field.

ConfigRow.description: A row of configuration values for a plugin configuration table.

fields.description: The configuration fields in the row.

defaultRow.description: Whether this row is the default.

AtmSelectionSettings.description: Selection settings for an access token management plugin instance.

inherited.description: If this token manager has a parent, this flag determines whether selection settings, such as resource URI's, are inherited from the parent. When set to true, the other fields in this model become read-only. The default value is false.

resourceUris.description: The list of base resource URI's which map to this token manager. A resource URI, specified via the 'aud' parameter, can be used to select a specific token manager for an OAuth request.

AtmAccessControlSettings.description: Access control settings for an access token management plugin instance.

inherited.description: If this token manager has a parent, this flag determines whether access control settings are inherited from the parent. When set to true, the other fields in this model become read-only. The default value is false.

restrictClients.description: Determines whether access to this token manager is restricted to specific OAuth clients. If false, the 'allowedClients' field is ignored. The default value is false.

allowedClients.description: If 'restrictClients' is true, this field defines the list of OAuth clients that are allowed to access the token manager.

PluginDescriptor.description: Defines a plugin type, including available configuration parameters.

className.description: Full class name of the class that implements this plugin.

attributeContract.description: The attribute contract for this plugin.

supportsExtendedContract.description: Determines whether this plugin supports extending the attribute contract.

configDescriptor.description: The descriptor which defines the configuration fields available for this plugin.

ConfigTable.description: A plugin configuration table populated with values.

inherited.description: Whether this table is inherited from its parent instance. If true, the rows become read-only. The default value is false.

AccessTokenManager.description: An OAuth access token management plugin instance.

id.description:
The ID of the plugin instance. The ID cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

name.description:
The plugin instance name. The name cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

pluginDescriptorRef.description:
Reference to the plugin descriptor for this instance. The plugin descriptor cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

parentRef.description:
The reference to this plugin's parent instance. The parent reference is only accepted if the plugin type supports parent instances.
Note: This parent reference is required if this plugin instance is used as an overriding plugin (e.g. connection adapter overrides)

attributeContract.description: The list of attributes that will be added to an access token.

selectionSettings.description: Settings which determine how this token manager can be selected for use by an OAuth request.

accessControlSettings.description: Settings which determine which clients may access this token manager.

sessionValidationSettings.description: Settings which determine how the user session is associated with the access token.

ActionDescriptor.description: Describes an arbitrary action that is available for a plugin.

download.description: Whether this action will trigger a download or invoke an internal action that will return a string result.

downloadContentType.description: If this is a download, this is the Content-Type of the downloaded file. Otherwise, this is null.

downloadFileName.description: If this is a download, this is the suggested file name of the downloaded file. Otherwise, this is null.

fieldPath.description: The path to the model field to which the error relates, if one exists.

PluginConfiguration.description: Configuration settings for a plugin instance.

AccessTokenManagerDescriptor.description: An OAuth access token management plugin descriptor.

className.description: Full class name of the class that implements this plugin.

attributeContract.description: The attribute contract for this plugin.

supportsExtendedContract.description: Determines whether this plugin supports extending the attribute contract.

configDescriptor.description: The descriptor which defines the configuration fields available for this plugin.

BaseSelectionFieldDescriptor.description: Holds fields that are shared by all selection-type field descriptors.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

optionValues.description: The list of option values for this selection field.

RadioGroupFieldDescriptor.description: A selection-type field intended to be rendered as a group of radio buttons in a UI.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

optionValues.description: The list of option values for this selection field.

TextAreaFieldDescriptor.description: A field intended to be rendered as a text box in a UI.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

rows.description: The number of rows for the text box.

columns.description: The number of columns for the text box.

location.description: A read-only URL that references the resource. If the resource is not currently URL-accessible, this property will be null.

PluginConfigDescriptor.description: Defines the configuration fields available for a plugin.

fields.description: The configuration fields available for this plugin.

tables.description: Configuration tables available for this plugin.

actionDescriptors.description: The available actions for this plugin.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.

AccessTokenManagerDescriptors.description: A collection of OAuth access token management plugin descriptors.

items.description: The list of OAuth access token management plugin descriptors.

AccessTokenManagers.description: A collection of OAuth access token management plugin instances.

items.description: The list of OAuth access token management plugin instances.

AccessTokenAttribute.description: An attribute for an Access Token's attribute contract.

UploadFileFieldDescriptor.description: A field which allows the user to upload a file.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

AccessTokenAttributeContract.description: A set of attributes exposed by an Access Token Manager.

coreAttributes.description: A list of core token attributes that are associated with the access token management plugin type. This field is read-only and is ignored on POST/PUT.

extendedAttributes.description: A list of additional token attributes that are associated with this access token management plugin instance.

inherited.description: Whether this attribute contract is inherited from its parent instance. If true, the rest of the properties in this model become read-only. The default value is false.

defaultSubjectAttribute.description: Default subject attribute to use for audit logging when validating the access token. Blank value means to use USER_KEY attribute value after grant lookup.

SelectFieldDescriptor.description: A selection field that is intended to be rendered as a dropdown list of options.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

optionValues.description: The list of option values for this selection field.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

SessionValidationSettings.description: Session validation settings for an access token management plugin instance.

inherited.description: If this token manager has a parent, this flag determines whether session validation settings, such as checkValidAuthnSession, are inherited from the parent. When set to true, the other fields in this model become read-only. The default value is false.

checkValidAuthnSession.description: Check for a valid authentication session when validating the access token.

checkSessionRevocationStatus.description: Check the session revocation status when validating the access token.

updateAuthnSessionActivity.description: Update authentication session activity when validating the access token.

defaultAccessTokenManagerRef.description: Reference to the default access token manager, if one is defined.
